items.title: Rio Olympics 2016: Chris Froome wins bronze in men's time trial
items.description: Great Britain's Chris Froome wins bronze in the Olympic men's individual time trial, won by Swiss Fabian Cancellara.

items.title: TfL defends English test rules amid Uber complaints
items.description: London's transport authority defends its decision to ensure private hire drivers have at least an intermediate level in English

items.title: Number crunching
items.description: David Sillito gives a guide to the issues about news and its struggle with numbers.
